snippet: New York City is questioning whether it is paying more than its fair share into a system that includes some of its best-known cultural institutions.
abstract: New York City suspends payments to Cultural Institutions Retirement System, pension plan that covers some workers some of city's best known cultural institutions, after review indicates that number of covered workers might be inflated.
lead_paragraph: New York City is questioning whether it is paying more than its fair share into a system that includes some of its best-known cultural institutions.

headline.seo: New York Suspends Arts Pension Payments
headline.main: City Suspends Pension Payments for Arts Institutions
headline.print_headline: City Suspends Pension Payments for Arts Institutions
